content: hi all FYI a new IG has been transferred across to HL7 Australia github org hosting this for HL7 international updates with intent to ballot - s published at http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/ophthal-collab-care-ig/branches/master/index.html and Github repo at https://github.com/hl7au/ophthal-collab-care-ig
@Brett Esler is this Ophthalmology IG to remain an international based IG? Or is there a plan to use AU Base profiles?
This is for international; hosting at HL7 AU for now as we sort out publishing...
just to let folks know - this is now published where it should be now at http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-eyecare-ig for international balloting
